features: 🎁【MAGNETIC TOYS FOR POINT & LINE TO PLANE】Looivo magnetic toy set consists of Balls and sticks is the same as the points and lines in geometry. Compared with other magnet toys, it is easier for beginners to understand 2D to 3D. And the magnetic combination of "click" together is easier for children to build and reduce learning anxiety. Highly recommended for toddlers and over 3 years old boys girls.

🎁【UPGRADE SAFETY & STRONGER MAGNETIC BLOCKS KIT】Unlike other magnetic balls and sticks set in the market, our magnetic building blocks have passed the choke tube test, larger size and stronger magnets. Premium ABS material surface is designed with special pattern to increase the grip. Perfect educational toys help children build more stable and movable models, such as number games, geometric figures, animals and architectural shapes, reducing the frustration of model collapse.

🎁【TODDLER-FRIENDLY & BEGINNER TOY SET & GIFT】Building blocks set includes 46 magnetic blocks, a creative booklet and a storage bag. Great for kids who have ADHD or anxiety issues to start learning . Storage bag allows children to keep the habit of storage and also the best choice for travel toys. Hand-in-hand instructions allow children to immerse themselves in the world of creation. Wonderful gift idea! Recommended toy gifts for toddlers and kids age 3-8.

🎁【PERFECT TEAMWORK TOYS】Suitable teaching for children, and great stress reliever for adults. It is also a perfect toy set to build up a positive relationship with little ones. （PLEASE NOTE: If you want to finish some complex graphics on the user manual, please purchase two or more sets of this STEM toy.）

🎁【BEST GIFT FOR KIDS THAT DRAW YOU IN】Magnet toys as STEM toys, which are popular with 3 4 5 years old boys girls. Kid will enjoy the fun of this magnetic tiles and learn by playing. Perfect gift for birthday, Children's day, Christmas, STEM, Easter, Preschool, Day Care Centers, School activities, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: As Albert Einstein said, Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere. Loovio's Magnetic Building Blocks Set is specially designed to stimulate the imagination and creativity of toddlers and kids. Learning by playing, help children better understand colors and geometric shapes. Definitely a perfect choice as an STEM educational toy for kids.

Safe Material Loovio's magnet toys ：Smooth Edges & Big Size & High quality ABS material make it a safe and fun toy for toddlers and kids. Multi-colored balls and sticks Choose bright colors to attract children's attention and improve kid's color recognition ability. Suitable for kids age 3456789 years old. Christmas, Birthday, New Years gift This magnetic balls and sticks set is a great gift for kids, it will give you a particularly enjoyable time of parent-child interaction and communication.

Great learning resource for kindergarten and grade school students. Our montessori toys are suitable for indoor and outdoor play, children can learn to share and collaborate with peers to solve problems while having fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great fun. Encourages creativity and motor skill play. Durable for little ones. Great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter loves these blocks. They are the right size for her small hands and being magnetic helps her build more easily. I just bought another set to add to her collection. The magnets are not loose within the blocks ,so I do not worry about a loose magnet somehow ending up in her mouth . I would recommend these blocks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The kids (3,7,10) like them!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. These are larger than I anticipated, and fewer than I realized. Still, all my kids enjoy messing with them, most of all the 3 year old.There are more in the kit than I have pictured, but you get balls, curves, short rods, and long rods.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My child loves them and are even fun to pick up and put away.

reviews.reviewText: The magnets are weak and don’t hold the shape

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They were smaller than I expected based on the pictures, but they seem like a neat product and my son loves them. They just don't need to act like they are bigger than they actually are.
